title: When...Is...Projecr...Week....Comeing....Out...????
body: please tell me when this "project week" we hear of is coming out because you posted about project cores and never even told us if there was a project week or if it was gonna be live this year.... please be more informational

replies.body:
*Walks in wearing a Poro hat*
Oh, hello!

I haven't specifics on an exact release date, but as our [Patch 6.15 Notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-615-notes#patch-upcoming-skins) mention, the new PROJECT content is slated for a release during this patch. For now, keep your eyes on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement!


**\#PROJECThype2016**

You are just looking to get Porocles to respond, I know it :3

They can't tell you outside of an official announcement when the dates are. You'll unfortunately just have to keep an eye out on the News page; http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/
I luv poro, do you look at my profile to see what I post or did you just guess I was look for poro miester

I saw the post (without stalking). I frequently post on H&S, but since Porocles was assigned here I've stepped out of his way during the daytime since he'll answer whether I do or not. You may see less of him and more of me at night :3
